resources:
MusicBee Remote When pressed it toggles the volume mute. When pressed it changes the repeat (all/none).
When pressed it changes the shuffle mode (on/off).
When pressed it plays the previous track When pressed either it starts playing a track or pauses it if it is already playing.
When pressed it plays the next track. It displays the album cover for the current track.
Settings Connection Settings Miscellaneous incoming_call_action Incoming call action Default action on incoming call \n\nRequires permission to read the Phone State.
This service is responsible for the communication of the application with the plugin.
Remote Control Application for MusicBee Share About MusicBee Remote MusicBee Remote Version The valid port range is from 1 to 65535 Search open_source Offline Authenticating Connected Computer name Hostname / IP Port number Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Artistname SCAN ADD Add Represents if this connection is the default selected connection

Feedback Send Feedback Feedback Help MusicBeeRemote InApp Feedback Send feedback using… Plugin Update Check Periodically check for updated versions of the plugin
plugin_update_check - More options Options none Playlists Library [Empty] Unknown artist Search your library Genres Artists Albums Tracks Sorry could not find any results for your search! The library metadata sync was incomplete or failed completely. This might result in queueing not working properly.. May cause performance degradation since it logs everything.
